title: Dr Phil's story
creator_credit: Phil Bergman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Dr Phil Bergman is a pediatrician and endocrinologist. He was encouraged to become involved with the Victorian Turner’s Syndrome Association and has since become a specialist in the field. Over the years he has contributed greatly to the care of those with Turner’s Syndrome and values support for those with the condition as much as medical advancements in the area.
